title: Burn
description:
This week's episode is all about the terrifying element of fire. First, Sapphire tells the true story of a girl with special gifts. Then, she shares a camp counselor's campfire story, investigates mysterious blazes, and explains the origins of a Thai ghost.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
